snippet: Kevin C. Spellman, a retired New York detective, apologized to the relatives of Drane Nikac, whom he killed in 2009, but they said his sentence was too light.
abstract: Retired New York City Police detective Kevin C Spellman is sentenced to three to nine years in prison for killing 66-year-old woman Drane Nikac in 2009 drunk-driving incident.
lead_paragraph: Kevin C. Spellman, a retired New York detective, apologized to the relatives of Drane Nikac, whom he killed in 2009, but they said his sentence was too light.

headline.seo: Ex-Detective Sentenced in Bronx D.W.I. Killing
headline.main: Ex-Detective Gets 3 to 9 Years in Prison for D.W.I. Crash That Killed a Woman
headline.print_headline: Ex-Detective Gets 3 to 9 Years in Prison for D.W.I. Crash That Killed a Woman
